themes: community and business engagement in arts promotion
artistic autonomy and resistance to commercial or political control
key_phrases: fund arts organizations and artists outside the HOT
educate residents and businesses to highlight and promote arts and culture
incentivize corporations to help fund and promote arts organizations and artists
not trying to control artistry with commercialism or political ideologies
fully empower artists to pursue what is authentic and inspiring for them
barriers_identified: potential control of artistry by commercial or political interests
solutions_proposed: find more ways for the city to fund arts organizations and artists outside the HOT
educate residents and businesses to highlight and promote arts and culture
incentivize corporations to help fund and promote arts organizations and artists
empower artists to pursue authentic and inspiring work without external control
